[i]Fimbulvetr[/i] – Whenever Zola, Illusionist enters, is turned face up, or another permanent you control is turned up, tap target creature and put two stun counters on it if it has no stun counters on it.
[i]Cold & Calculated[/i] – {2}: Whenever target creature dies this turn, exile it, then cloak it. [i](It enters under its owner's control)[/i]
Disguise {1}{U}{B} [i](You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)[/i]
